extension.name: pdf_embed Package
extension.author: Techjoomla
extension.description:
Embed - PDF

  • Steps -
    1.Enable content- PDF Embed.
    2. Enable Button - Embed PDF
    3. Go to the article and click EMBED - PDF button
    4. Add fields in pop-up box.
    Save the article.
  • Syntax -
    For native Relative path - {pdf=images/pdf/example.pdf|100%|500|native} OR Absolute path - {http://sitename.com/images/pdf/example.pdf|100%|500|native}
    For google {pdf=http://sitename.com/example.pdf|100%|500|google}
    For pdfjs {pdf=http://yoursitename.com/example.pdf|100%|500|pdfjs}
  • Note - Native viewer is not compatible with a mobile devices
